title: Cat on a Laptop
description: A productivity companion that walks on your keyboard and sleeps on your deadlines.

title: Certificate of Existence
description: Need to prove you're real? This official-looking certificate has your back.

title: Box of Emotions
description: A mystery box filled with unpredictable feelings. Shake it and feel... something.

title: Mystery Juice
description: Unknown flavor. Unknown effects. All we know is it's juicy.

title: NFT of Sadness
description: A digital collectible representing eternal melancholy. Comes with no utility.

title: Nothing Box
description: It's a box. With nothing in it. Just your imagination.

title: Pet Rock (Deluxe Edition)
description: The low-maintenance pet of your dreams, now with a luxury carrying pouch.

title: Premium Air
description: Artisanal oxygen harvested by monks from the upper Himalayas (probably).

title: Scream Plant
description: Screams softly when ignored for more than 24 hours. Built-in guilt-tripping included.

title: Invisible Hat
description: Fashion-forward. Physics-defying. Literally nothing to see here.

title: Time Machine Instruction Manual
description: Step-by-step guide to operating a time machine you definitely don't have.
